question.text: Hydrogen peroxide oxidises <math><mo>[</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">F</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">e</mi><mo>(</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">N</mi><msub><mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mrow><mn>6</mn></mrow></msub><msup><mrow><mo>]</mo></mrow><mrow><mn>4</mn><mo>-</mo></mrow></msup></math> to <math><mo>[</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">F</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">e</mi><mo>(</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">N</mi><msub><mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mrow><mn>6</mn></mrow></msub><msup><mrow><mo>]</mo></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn><mo>-</mo></mrow></msup></math> in acidic medium but reduces <math><mo>[</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">F</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">e</mi><mo>(</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">N</mi><msub><mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mrow><mn>6</mn></mrow></msub><msup><mrow><mo>]</mo></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn><mo>-</mo></mrow></msup></math> to <math><mo>[</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">F</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">e</mi><mo>(</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">N</mi><msub><mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mrow><mn>6</mn></mrow></msub><msup><mrow><mo>]</mo></mrow><mrow><mn>4</mn><mo>-</mo></mrow></msup></math> in alkaline medium. The other products formed are, respectively
